locations.name: Campus Entrance
locations.brief_description: You are at the campus entrance (your starting point).
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 1

You are at the main campus entrance. You just woke up and realized you're missing important items! You need to find your USB drive, laptop charger, and lucky mug before 1pm. You can go east to explore the campus.

locations.name: Main Path
locations.brief_description: You are on the main campus path.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 2

You are walking along the main campus path. Students are rushing to their classes. You can continue east or go back west. You can also head south.

locations.name: Academic Building
locations.brief_description: You are near an academic building.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 3

You are standing near a large academic building. The morning sun reflects off its windows. You can go east to the cafe, west back to the path, or south.

locations.name: Campus Cafe
locations.brief_description: You are at the campus cafe.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 4

You are at the busy campus cafe. The smell of coffee fills the air. You see your T-card on a table (you must have left it here yesterday!) and your lucky mug near the counter! You can go west or south.

locations.name: South Campus Path
locations.brief_description: You are on the south campus path.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 5

You are on a quieter path on the south side of campus. Trees line both sides. You can go north, east, or south.

locations.name: Oak House Residence
locations.brief_description: You are at Oak House residence.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 6

You are standing in front of Oak House, your friend's residence. The door is locked with a key lock. Inside, you remember charging your laptop here yesterday! Your laptop charger must be inside! You can go west, east, or south.

locations.name: Recreation Area
locations.brief_description: You are at the recreation area.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 7

You are at an outdoor recreation area. A few students are playing frisbee. You can go north, west, east, or south.

locations.name: Student Center
locations.brief_description: You are at the student center.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 8

You are at the student center. It's bustling with activity. You can go north, west, or south.

locations.name: West Courtyard
locations.brief_description: You are in the west courtyard.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 9

You are in a peaceful courtyard with benches and a small fountain. You can go north, east, or south.

locations.name: Garden Path
locations.brief_description: You are on a garden path.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 10

You are walking along a beautiful garden path with flowers on both sides. You can go north, west, east, or south.

locations.name: Bahen Center
locations.brief_description: You are at the Bahen Center.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 11

You are at the Bahen Center for Information Technology. You were working here yesterday! Your USB drive is on a desk in the corner! You can go north, west, east, or south.

locations.name: Science Building
locations.brief_description: You are at the science building.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 12

You are at the main science building. Lab equipment can be seen through the windows. You can go north, west, or south.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 13

You are at the entrance of Robarts Library. The massive brutalist building looms above. The entrance requires a T-card to enter. You studied here yesterday and remember seeing a dorm key on a study desk inside! You can go north, east, or south.

locations.name: Central Plaza
locations.brief_description: You are at the central plaza.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 14

You are at a central plaza where many paths intersect. Students are sitting on benches. You can go north, west, east, or south.

locations.name: East Quad
locations.brief_description: You are at the east quad.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 15

You are at the eastern quadrangle. Old oak trees provide shade. You can go north, west, or east.

locations.name: Sports Complex
locations.brief_description: You are at the sports complex.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 16

You are at the athletic sports complex. You can hear the sounds of games being played inside. You can go north or west.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A silver USB drive with all your project files. You desperately need this!

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Your laptop charger. Your battery is almost dead!

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: Your lucky U of T mug. You can't submit without it!

items.name: T-card
items.description: Your student ID card. Needed to enter certain buildings.

items.name: Dorm Key
items.description: A key to Oak House residence.
